translations.translation: Therefore here today he has no friend
That is why he has no friend today,
Today he has been left here friendless;
On this day, they will have no friends
“So he does not have any friend here this day.”
So, no friend has he here this Day,
Therefore he has not here today a true friend,
therefore he today has not here one loyal friend,
Therefor hath he no lover here this day,
so today he has no friend here,
Wherefore for him here this Day there is no friend.
so he has no friend here today,
So no friend hath he here this Day.
So no friend has he here this Day,
Today he shall have no loyal friend here,
So he has no friend here today.
So there is not for him here this Day any devoted friend
[69:35] therefore here today he has no [loyal] friend, [no] relative to avail him,
(Therefore hath he no lover here this day) this day he has no relative to benefit him,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { فَلَيْسَ لَهُ ٱلْيَوْمَ هَا هُنَا حَمِيمٌ وَلاَ طَعَامٌ إِلاَّ مِنْ غِسْلِينٍ } معناه ما غُسِلَ من الجِراحِ والدّبرِ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { فَلَيْسَ لَهُ ٱلْيَوْمَ هَا هُنَا } أي: في يوم العرض والجزاء { حَمِيمٌ } [الحاقة: 35] قريب من أقاربه يحميه ويشفع له، كما في الدنيا
